document.full_text: a series of surveillance videotapes showed officers suspected of falsifying reports, illegally entering residences and, in one instance, making a purposefully flawed arrest for drug possession.
document.title: dozens of cases to be dropped in san francisco police scandal
lines_and_colors: a series of surveillance videotapes showed officers suspected of falsifying reports, illegally entering residences and, in one instance, making a purposefully flawed arrest for drug possession.
